description: This file defines the 'TodoApp' web component using LitElement, managing a to-do list with event handling, rendering, and styles.

classes.name: TodoApp
classes.description: A LitElement-based web component implementing a to-do list application with event handling and rendering.

methods.name: constructor
methods.description: Initializes the TodoApp component, sets up event listeners.

methods.name: connectedCallback
methods.description: Connects the todo list when the component is added to the DOM.

methods.name: disconnectedCallback
methods.description: Disconnects the todo list when the component is removed from the DOM.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders the HTML template for the to-do app.

methods.name: #onAddTodo
methods.description: Handles adding a new to-do item.
